name: Comply with UK REACH
synonyms: Manage your chemicals on UK REACH
Comply with UK REACH: submit and manage chemical registrations and notifications
Submit and Managing Chemical Registrations and Notifications
description: If you’re based in Great Britain (England, Scotland and Wales), you’ll need to follow UK REACH regulations to manufacture, import, sell or distribute chemical substances or mixtures.
organisation: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs
